p: The kingdom of Serendip has lost its sacred relic. The king has sent out a call for adventurers to find it.
Quest objective 1: Find the lost relic of Serendip
The relic is said to be located in the ruins of the Old Town, overrun by monsters.

li.title: Task 1: Search for the relic within the ruins
li.description: Search through the ruins of the Old Town, the relic is believed to be somewhere within the ruins.

li.title: Task 2: Search for the relic in the ruins
li.description: Search through the ruins of the Old Town, the relic is believed to be somewhere within the ruins.

title: Task 3: Return the relic to King Serendi
Return the relic to King Serendi at the castle
li.description: Once the relic is found, return it to King Serendi at the castle.
